se.cbb.jprime.prm

Class BooleanAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.prm.BooleanAttribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<ProbAttribute>, DiscreteAttribute, ProbAttribute

    public class BooleanAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
implements DiscreteAttribute
    Defines a probabilistic boolean PRM attribute. Treated similarly to {0,1}-valued integer attribute. The attribute automatically adds itself to its PRM class.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BooleanAttribute

        public BooleanAttribute(java.lang.String name,
                PRMClass prmClass,
                boolean isLatent,
                int initialCapacity,
                ProbAttribute.DependencyConstraints dependencyConstraints)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - attribute's name. Should be unique within PRM class.
        prmClass - PRM class this attribute belongs to.
        isLatent - true if hidden or unknown.
        initialCapacity - initial capacity for attribute entities.
        dependencyConstraints - dependency structure constraints.

      • getEntityProbDistribution

        public double[] getEntityProbDistribution(int idx)
        Description copied from interface: DiscreteAttribute
        For latent attributes, returns the current estimation of an entity's probability distribution, i.e., its soft completion. Indexing complies with the getEntityAsInt() method.
        Specified by:
        getEntityProbDistribution in interface DiscreteAttribute
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.
        Returns:
        the estimated probability distribution.

      • setEntityProbDistribution

        public void setEntityProbDistribution(int idx,
                             double[] probDist)
        Description copied from interface: DiscreteAttribute
        For latent attributes, sets the current estimation of an entity's probability distribution, i.e., its soft completion. Does not affect the corresponding current hard assignment. Indexing complies with the getEntityAsInt() method.
        Specified by:
        setEntityProbDistribution in interface DiscreteAttribute
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.
        probDist - the soft completion.

      • addEntityAsInt

        public void addEntityAsInt(int value)
        Description copied from interface: DiscreteAttribute
        Adds an entity as an integer. If latent, this also adds a corresponding soft completion for the entity. See getEntityAsInt() for more info.
        Specified by:
        addEntityAsInt in interface DiscreteAttribute
        Parameters:
        value - the value in the range 0,...,k-1.

      • clearEntityProbDistribution

        public void clearEntityProbDistribution(int idx)
        Description copied from interface: DiscreteAttribute
        For latent attributes, sets the current estimation of an entity's soft completion to NaN for all values.
        Specified by:
        clearEntityProbDistribution in interface DiscreteAttribute
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.

      • normaliseEntityProbDistribution

        public void normaliseEntityProbDistribution(int idx)
        Description copied from interface: DiscreteAttribute
        For latent attributes, normalises the current estimation of an entity's soft completion so that they sum up to 1. A NaN value is considered 0.0.
        Specified by:
        normaliseEntityProbDistribution in interface DiscreteAttribute
        Parameters:
        idx - the index.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:

      • useSharpSoftCompletion

        public void useSharpSoftCompletion()
        Description copied from interface: DiscreteAttribute
        For a latent attribute, sets the soft completion of a value to 1.0 for precisely that value. Mostly for debugging purposes. Only applicable on latent attributes.
        Specified by:
        useSharpSoftCompletion in interface DiscreteAttribute

      • getMostProbEntityAsInt

        public int getMostProbEntityAsInt(int idx)
        Description copied from interface: DiscreteAttribute
        For a latent attribute entity, returns the highest ranked value in its current soft completion. Indexing complies with the getEntityAsInt() method.
        Specified by:
        getMostProbEntityAsInt in interface DiscreteAttribute
        Parameters:
        idx - the entity.
        Returns:
        the value with the highest soft completion score.
